name: Draft
description: Initial draft by the risk champion

name: Submitted for Review
description: Submitted for review to the department owner

name: Resubmitted
description: Resubmitted by the risk champion after feedback

name: Under Review
description: Under review by the department owner

name: Rejected
description: Rejected and feedback provided by the department owner

name: Closed
description: Closed after all assessments and approvals
